article_title: Castle Owner's Connections Investigated in Shooting
article_text:
Investigators were scrutinizing the personal and business relationships of a Long Island developer and political fundraiser Tuesday as they hunted for the gunman who shot him outside Oheka Castle, the ornate estate where he lives, authorities said.

Gary Melius, 69 years old, was fired upon at least three times and was hit once on the right side of the head Monday in the parking lot of the castle, a popular event space he owns, Suffolk County Police Department Det. Sgt. John O'Sullivan said. "We're going to...
